data.text: @DrTomFrieden Threats??  You mean politicized threats to shut down our econony, close schools and put our livelihoods in jeopardy?
@kimtfiu @DrTomFrieden So he is pushing his own agenda. I bet his stocks in  big pharma paid him well.
@Northofwestward @DrTomFrieden Most of those 2600 were elderly and/or unvaccinated

@kevinkkeller1 @DrTomFrieden Um, no. Obviously we have scientists who were sequencing the virus as well. And if you could read, I was not agreeing with Dr Tom- I was emphatically disagreeing. Tho I had of course heard of him before covid bc he used to be CDC director!
@kimtfiu @DrTomFrieden And of course you still haven't explained why the cdc and fda continue to stop treatments that work.

@kimtfiu @DrTomFrieden So your saying all of this testing was done in China?
And miraculously made it into the United States?
You really need to ask deeper questions.
And stop listening to so called experts like this Dr. Tom who nobody ever heard of before.
@DrTomFrieden The thing is, the high risk counties are the ones where people aren’t masking anyway.
@wherewereweb4 @DrTomFrieden Nah. Everything already causes heart disease. Stress, western diet, smoking etc. What’s one more thing?

@kevinkkeller1 @DrTomFrieden ok that has nothing to do with your other questions. we didn't have good treatments in the beginning & hospitals were overwhelmed. many elderly (& younger people) died from COVID.
